alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 19 at 4:27AM CDT until May 20 at 4:09AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas... Neosho River near Emporia 3nw affecting Lyon County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neosho River near Emporia 3nw. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs along the river upstream to Dunlap and downstream to Neosho Rapids. At 19.5 feet, Prairie Street, north of the bridge, floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:56 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 23.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this afternoon and continue falling to 9.6 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/top/.
